Introduction

Mandong (만동) is a Seoul-based trio band that blends jazz, psychedelic, rock, indie, and classic music. Formed in 2019 by Seokyoung Haam (guitar) and Kyungsoo Seo (drums), they were later joined by Namhyun Song (double bass) in 2021. The name “Mandong” carries the dual meanings of “tight movement” and “dumpling club.”
